post:
**Pulsed Media 2021 Black Friday V1000 Special**

A nice recurring discount on [V1000](https://pulsedmedia.com/value1000-seedbox.php) Series seedboxes!
-15% recurring for any payment period. You can compound this with the long term discount too.

 * **V1000 XS**: 1TB Storage, 1GB Ram, 1Gbps bandwidth, 4 000GiB External Traffic, Unlimited Internal Traffic: [~~5.99€~~ 5.09€ Per Month](https://pulsedmedia.com/clients/cart.php?a=add&pid=228&billingcycle=monthly&promocode=2021bflet-v1000-15recur)
 * **V1000 S**: 4TB Storage, 3GB Ram, 1Gbps bandwidth, 20 000GiB External Traffic, Unlimited Internal Traffic: [~~9.99€~~ 8.49€ Per Month](https://pulsedmedia.com/clients/cart.php?a=add&pid=229&billingcycle=monthly&promocode=2021bflet-v1000-15recur)
 * **V1000 M**: 6TB Storage, 6GB Ram, 1Gbps bandwidth, Unlimited* External Traffic, Unlimited Internal Traffic: [~~13.99€~~ 11.89€ Per Month](https://pulsedmedia.com/clients/cart.php?a=add&pid=230&billingcycle=monthly&promocode=2021bflet-v1000-15recur)
 * **V1000 L**: 8TB Storage, 8GB Ram, 1Gbps bandwidth, Unlimited* External Traffic, Unlimited Internal Traffic: [~~19.99€~~ 16.99€ Per Month](https://pulsedmedia.com/clients/cart.php?a=add&pid=231&billingcycle=monthly&promocode=2021bflet-v1000-15recur)

Promocode: 2021bflet-v1000-15recur
Long term discounts compoundable. _Price updates on checkout page._ Only 1 per customer.

Check them all out at: https://pulsedmedia.com/value1000-seedbox.php Price updates on checkout page.

If you are looking for 10Gbps bandwidth, check out our newly released [V10G 10Gbps RAID0 seedboxes](https://www.lowendtalk.com/discussion/175244/new-10gbps-value-seedbox-from-pulsed-media-v10g-series-upto-40tb-of-storage-with-10gbps/)


 * [14-day full moneyback guarantee](http://wiki.pulsedmedia.com/index.php/Pulsed_Media_Refunds_Policy)
 * [Very Strong Privacy Policy](http://wiki.pulsedmedia.com/index.php/Pulsed_Media_Privacy_Policy)
 * [Standard seedbox Service Level Agreement(SLA)](http://wiki.pulsedmedia.com/index.php/Pulsed_Media_Seedbox_SLA_Policy)
 * [Terms Of Service](http://pulsedmedia.com/terms%20and%20conditions.pdf)
 * [Free Bonus Disk Quota](http://wiki.pulsedmedia.com/index.php/Pulsed_Media_Free_Bonus_Disk_Policy)
 * Hosted from our own Datacenter in Helsinki, Finland
 * rTorrent / ruTorrent  +  **Deluge**
 * Public trackers allowed
 * HTTP, HTTPS, FTP, SFTP, LFTP, SSH access
 * rclone, sonarr, pyload, resilio, syncthing, btsync (1.4 and 2.2), ffmpeg, fuse (unionfs, sshfs, s3fs etc.) etc.
 * [Jellyfin](https://pulsedmedia.com/clients/announcements.php?id=523) and [Emby](http://pulsedmedia.com/clients/announcements.php?id=485) can be installed within your userspace
 * [Green Datacenter operations](http://blog.pulsedmedia.com/2017/04/steady-progress-green-operations/)
 * Datacenter Location: Helsinki, Finland
 * Some latency metrics: 20ms DECIX, 36ms OVH, 38ms Online, 0.4-0.6ms Cloudflare, 31ms Leaseweb, 36ms Redstation (UK), 23ms Hetzner (DE), 23ms Serverloft/PlusServer
 * **Setup is INSTANT**


*Payment methods*

 * Paypal
 * Crypto (BTC, LTC, XMR, ETH, DOGE and many others.)
